attributes.action: Start track and trace app for finding people with Covid-19 in the whole UK now
attributes.additional_details: The government are only trialling it in the Isle of Wight but it is too slow.  This app needs to be allowed to be used all over the UK before more people die.
attributes.background: This app needs to be actioned all over the UK to stop the spread of Covid-19 immediately

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/304827
